data.prayer: Father, help the 89,304 believers in Wenzhou to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,087,897 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 88 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 89,304 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the She people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you gave the church of Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 89,304 believers in Wenzhou to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Wenzhou
